titles.title: A bill to authorize the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution to plan and design an extension of the National Air and Space Museum at Washington Dulles International Airport, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2552-2553)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. With written report No. 103-28.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 42.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Libraries and Memorials.

bill.summary: 3/9/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution to plan and design an extension of the National Air and Space Museum at Washington Dulles International Airport. Authorizes appropriations.
